A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie builds and builds and builds nearly the entire time\, and then wraps up with a near perfect\, beautifully poetic finale. Didn’t care for some of the campy moments that these movies can’t seem to live without. But they do bring a bit of lighthearted humor to an otherwise generally dark and serious movie. Overall a beautiful film. Low fan ratings are most likely due to a difference in the film vs. expectations. Don’t listen to those hacks. See this movie. Then make plans to see it again!
